app.curation.eventSelection.batteryWarni: Image analysis can take a lot of power when creating a Smart Photobook and therefore quickly drains the battery. You might want to charge your smartphone before you continue.
app.curation.eventSelection.missingGeoTa: Hello there, we found that some of your photos do not contain geolocation information. To give you the best photo sorting results, that information helps us a lot. If you want to change your settings, open the Camera App and navigate to → “Settings” → “Save Locations” or “Geotagging”. Simply enable this feature.

Hello there, we found that some of your photos do not contain geolocation information. To give you the best photo sorting results, that information helps us a lot. If you want to change your settings, open the Settings App and navigate to → “Privacy” → “Location Services” → “Camera”. Select “While Using the App”.
app.curation.eventSelection.noMemories.m: We are sad that we could not curate any meaningful photo moments for your photo book. There could be few reasons behind it:
app.curation.eventSelection.noMemories.r: The more pictures you collect, the better suggestions we can provide to you. In the meantime please use our classic photo books or other product categories for curating your print product.
Please provide us full access to your Photo Library in your phone settings.
Limited access permission to Photo Library:
app.curation.eventSelection.onboardingSc: Let us make you a proposal for your photo book. We will pick some of your most important events and sort them on top.
Privacy: Photos are analyzed on the device and remain on the device and are only transferred when the product is ordered or saved.
Suggestions in the picture overview: Adjust your selection.
Find the best photo: long-press on photo leads to the detail view.
Save photo book online and add more photos on other devices.
Please note that the loading time may be longer if you have stored your photos in iCloud.
We are happy to receive feedback and wishes from you.
app.curation.eventSelection.title: Choose your Event

ipl.sdk.android.arpreview.dialog.require: Your device currently does not meet all requirements for the AR mode. Please make sure to install Google Play™ Services for AR and allow the app to access your camera. You will now be taken back to the editor, but will be prompted again for these requirements on your next attempt to use AR mode.
ipl.sdk.arpreview.button.restart.tooltip: Remove mounted product and start over
ipl.sdk.arpreview.dialog.modeltransferfa: We were unfortunately unable to generate a 3D model of your product. AR preview will not work for this product, but you can continue to design it in the editor and order it as usual.
ipl.sdk.arpreview.instruction.devicerais: Now raise the device up slowly until it is facing the wall.
ipl.sdk.arpreview.instruction.floorscann: Slowly pan the device over the floor near the wall where you want to hang your picture.
ipl.sdk.arpreview.instruction.modelloadi: The 3D model is currently loading and will be ready in a moment. Please wait…
ipl.sdk.arpreview.instruction.productmou: Mount your picture at the currently marked position by touching the button.
ipl.sdk.arpreview.instruction.productrep: Choose a new spot by moving the device and confirm with button.
ipl.sdk.arpreview.instruction.wallscanni: Now slowly pan the device left and right, keeping it pointing towards the wall.
ipl.sdk.arpreview.introduction.descripti: The augmented reality preview mode allows you to experience your designed wall décor virtually projected into the real surroundings of your room. Please read these important instructions before you continue:
ipl.sdk.arpreview.introduction.lightingh: The camera needs good lighting conditions and contrast to properly detect your environment. Please turn on a few lights now if necessary.
ipl.sdk.arpreview.introduction.obstacleh: Looking at the screen while moving around can be quite distracting. Please watch your step and make sure not to stumble over any obstacles!
ipl.sdk.arpreview.introduction.positioni: Are you ready to start your AR experience? Then please position yourself in front of a wall at a distance of about 1.5 m, hold your device’s camera pointing to the floor, and tap the button below.
ipl.sdk.arpreview.introduction.surfacehi: Detection works best on walls with structured wallpaper. If you have a monochrome wall surface instead, please consider taping a differently colored paper sheet on the wall to improve detection.
ipl.sdk.arpreview.introduction.title: Welcome to AR Preview Mode
